directions: In a medium saucepan combine the flour, sugar, egg yolk, vinegar and reserved pineapple juice. Cook over medium heat until thick. Remove from heat and chill.
in a large bowl combine the pineapple, apples, peanuts and chilled cooked mixture. Fold in whipped topping and chill for at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved
4 large apples, cored and diced with peel
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Taffy Apple Salad I
